name: Nami
text: On Play: If you have 3 or less cards in hand, return up to one of your opponents' characters with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

effect.text: If you have 3 or less cards in hand, return up to one of your opponents' characters with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but ID and other fields are readable.
